#| label: military-spending-admitted
#| fig-cap: "Military Spending: What They Admit ($2.7 Trillion)"

import sys
import os
from pathlib import Path

# Add project root to path (find it relative to current working directory)
project_root = Path.cwd()
if project_root.name != 'decentralized-institutes-of-health':
    while project_root.name != 'decentralized-institutes-of-health' and project_root.parent != project_root:
        project_root = project_root.parent
sys.path.insert(0, str(project_root))

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

from brain.figures._chart_style import (
    setup_chart_style, add_watermark, clean_spines,
    COLOR_BLACK, COLOR_RED, COLOR_WHITE
)

# Setup neobrutalist styling
setup_chart_style(style='light', dpi=150)

# Create chart
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(12, 10))

# Data
value = 2.7  # In trillions
color = '#FFFF00'  # Yellow for "what they admit"

# Single bar
bar = ax.bar(['Military Spending\n(Admitted)'], [value],
              color=color, edgecolor=COLOR_BLACK, linewidth=4, width=0.5)

# Add value label on bar
ax.text(0, value/2, f'$2.7\nTRILLION', ha='center', va='center',
        color=COLOR_BLACK, fontsize=48, fontweight='bold')

# Annotations
ax.text(0, value + 0.2, 'PER YEAR', ha='center', va='bottom',
        color=COLOR_RED, fontsize=24, fontweight='bold')

# Formatting
ax.set_ylim(0, 3)
ax.set_yticks([])  # Remove y-axis - value is on the bar
ax.tick_params(colors=COLOR_BLACK, labelsize=16)

# Brutal borders
for spine in ['top', 'right', 'left']:
    ax.spines[spine].set_visible(False)
ax.spines['bottom'].set_color(COLOR_BLACK)
ax.spines['bottom'].set_linewidth(4)

# Add watermark
add_watermark(fig)

# Save in brain/figures directory
output_dir = project_root / 'brain' / 'figures'
output_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
plt.savefig(output_dir / 'military-spending-admitted-2.7-trillion.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight', facecolor='white')
plt.show()

# Print details
print("\nðŸ’£ MILITARY SPENDING (ADMITTED):")
print(f"  $2.7 trillion per year")
print(f"  = $85,616 per second")
print(f"  = 13,000 nuclear warheads")
print(f"  = Enough to kill everyone 535 times")
print(f"\nThis is just what they admit to...")
